NewsItem.HEADLINE: 5G Broadband Business Case 2018
NewsItem.SUMMARY: ROI analysis of five key 5G investment scenarios, including capacity analysis, expected RAN investment and related costs, and cash flow forecasts.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report analyzes 1) Fixed wireless access in mm-wave bands, 2) FWA and mobile 5G investment below 6 GHz; 3) Major USA operators and mm-wave 5G investment on top of CBRS, LAA, and 3.7 GHz 5G networks; 4) the T-Mobile-Sprint merger and likely 5G investment; and 5) European 5G investments based on existing European traffic density and demand growth.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: ROI 5G broadband FWA cash flow capacity demand forecast
